description.value: Can use Half Action in Combat to direct allies, such that none of them suffer penalties for ganging up until your next turn. If defending against a boarding action, Can use a Half Action to give +10 in combat to armsmen.

system.benefit: Can use Half Action in Combat to direct allies, such that none of them suffer penalties for ganging up until your next turn. If defending against a boarding action, Can use a Half Action to give +10 in combat to armsmen.

specialAbilities.name: Master of Command
specialAbilities.description: Can issue two orders per Round as a Full Action instead of one.
